NAME: invites
DESCRIPTION: Allows you to see your invitations or those of a friend.
IS_BOT: Cannot see invitations from a bot.
BLACKLISTED: You or the mentionned user is blacklisted on this server, please contact a Moderator / Administrator.
NEXT_RANK: {{invitationsLeft}} more invitations left to get the role ** {{nextRank}} **
OPTIONS_MEMBER_DESCRIPTION: The member to check the invites of.
